subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Patriots snatched up Darrelle Revis hours after the Buccaneers released him, according to a person in the N.F.L. The Jets agreed to terms with the former Broncos receiver Eric Decker.
snippet: The Patriots snatched up Darrelle Revis hours after the Buccaneers released him, according to a person in the N.F.L. The Jets agreed to terms with the former Broncos receiver Eric Decker.
